reviews.review:
Ich finde, dass Dead by Daylight ein sehr schönes und gelungenes Spiel ist. Ich habe damit vor ca. 1 Jahr angefangen und mich hat sofort die "Sucht" gepackt. An dem Spiel gefällt mir sehr, dass oft neue Updates kommen, d.h. öfters neue Killer, Überlebende usw. Es kommen auch öfters Bug-Updates, das sagt einem ja schon das sich die Entwickler sehr viel Mühe geben und alles daran setzen alles mögliche zu beheben. 
Es gibt natürlich auch die ein oder anderen Mängel im Spiel, die einem aber dank der starken guten Sachen fast gar nicht auffallen. 
Für alle, die "Horror" Spiele mögen, empfehle ich dieses Spiel sehr. Ich persönlich würde DBD nicht in Horror einordnen, da es einem manchmal nur den einen oder anderen Schreckmoment gibt.
good

After the release of Friday the 13th, they finally realised what they had was special and have been improving this game at a rate I have not seen before from the company. they have been adding characters non-stop and doing bug fixs every few days. Glad they are turning the ship around!
Really fun game brah. Not including camping,infinites and a whole lot of stuff.
Best game as killer :D
One of the best games at this moment.
Ile to sie kurwa wczytuje do chuja ???

Major balancing issues. There really is little hope agianst a team of 4 that are in some chat together. Perks also ruin this game, especially the speed burst perks. Might as well give up if survivors have and speed burst perks.

Also, and I cannot stress this enough, you have a high chance of losing your progress. When I emailed the devs, they said they would look into the matter, then never did anything.

Might be fun for the first 10 hours, after that, you will see the flaws in this game. Can't recommend it.

...and you wonder why this game is dying? 

Only reason there is a player base at all is, they practically give it away to console players, and you have the misinterpretation that it looks entertaining and exciting when professional YouTuber's post their HIGHLIGHTS.

Only buy this game if you intend on being a toxic douche-bag. Who wants to play a skewed game in their favor that spoon-feeds you delicious ego, because you're entitled.

Cant play one game as a killer without meta-perks-4 SWF on coms with 4 flashlights who 
intentionally block you to t-bag you and give you the worst game play experience you'll ever witness outside of league of legends. 

Dev's refuse to correctly balance their heavily unbalanced game, and they are solely focused on getting your money through micro-transactions instead of making the game fun to play, FOR BOTH PARTIES.

Spend your time wisely, and don't waste your life on earth inside this salt filled breeding ground of internet crybabies.

(If you press E, don't even blink twice at me)
I know I have low amount of hours in this game ,,, but trust me this game is good especially when mad killer camp you

Dead by Daylight is an awesome game. It really gets your heart beating trying to evade the killer. I would recommend this game to everybody.
Игра, в которой маньяк боится выживших больше чем они его
it is a good game i would give it a 8/10

Overall, the game is good.
The concept of the game is great.The mechanics are good and it can even be more competitive one day.
You can play alone or with friends and it still is a great source of entertainment.
Updates keep coming very often with balance changes to characters and perks and more game content
The ranking system is good enough but there needs to be some reward at the end of each season.

BUT!! the devs are lacking the ability to fix some game breaking bugs though. The greatest one being the progress loss which has happened to tons of people playing this game and has recently happened to me when i only played it for 27 hours so far. This needs to be fixed as soon as possible in order for the game to progress further into development. this should be top priority.

Should you buy it?
The short answer is yes, but you need to take counter measures to ensure that you dont lose your progress and have to wait 6 weeks approx to get it back.

all rank 1 survivor more like rank 20 
rank up for survivor to easy pls fix

"i think we did a pretty good job so far" NO duud
just play survivor and  bully the killer and u will be fine <3
ke yi

Das spiel ist klasse soviel man mekern kann hat man trotzdem spaß.
Ich erzähl euch aber nun Punkte die mich nerven.


Wenn ein Überlebender den Killer maximal Trollt will der Killer ihn ja sehr gerne aus seinem spiel raushaben deswegen wird er ge Facecampt.Was mich daran nervt,dass der Überlebende und andere dannach schreiben Sch*** Camper deinstalire das Spiel, obwol sie sich das selbst zuzuschreiben haben da sie den Killer so nerven das er irgendwann keine lust mehr hat.Damit will ich aber nicht sagen das die Überlebenden einfach stehen bleiben sollen, sondern das sie einfach Killer nicht zur weißglut bringen sollen z.B. das sie nicht immer sachen nutzen sollen wo man sie nicht bekommt.Denn wenn man es mal nicht schafft freut sich der Killer dann über einen kill oder Killer campen (Facecampen) auch wenn sie keinen Überlebenden bekommen haben und schon alle Tore offen sind da sie wenigstens einen kill haben wollen ,da sie nicht wie der letzte noob aussehen wollen obwohl wenn man facecampt oderso nur noch noobiger auf die anderen wirkt.


Dann gibt es so Leute die die ganze Runde nichts machen sondern sich nur verstecken und sich erst bewegen wenn man einen raben hat.Wenn sie dann mal gejagt werden laufen sie auch immer zu anderen und schmieren den Killer an ihnen ab, am ende führt es wieder dazu das er einfach hängen gelassen wird er sich aber im Lobbychat  darüber aufregt und andere leute beleidigt.(so wird der chat voll mit Schimpfwörtern)

Dann haben die Entwickler ja ein neues Rangsystem für die Killer rausgebracht,nun muss man Leute töten um ein Rangkristall zu bekommen.So wird man ziemlich zum Campen gezwungen was auf hohen Rängen nichts bringt da die Überlebenden solange er Campt die anderen Gens(Generatoren)machen.Trotzdem wird fast jedes dritte match gecampt.

Dann bringen die Entwickler immer super starke Killer raus z.B. jetzt der Kanibale oder die Jägerin.Das nervt da es einfach nicht fair ist das Killer schneller und Stärker sind als die Überlebenden.Bei der Krankenschwester ist es ok da sie unglaublich schwer zu erlernen (spielen)ist.

Dann nutzen manche Leute immer Bugs aus um einen zu töten oder um zu Überleben.
Manche nutzen auch Cheats was ich unter aller sau finde da das Spiel schon Schwer genug ist.

Trotz all den Punken bleibt es  mein Lieblings Spiel da es das beste Horrormultiplayer Game ist und wenn man dann noch mit coolen Leuten (Freunden) Spielt ist es einfach Geil
总体来说 还是不错的游戏，打折时候买的
友達と一緒にやれば楽しい(´・ω・｀)
SERIOUSLY ITS TOO LONG TO WATE TO BE THE KILLER THERES NO ONE BUT WHEN YOU ARE THE SURVIVAL EVERYBODY CAME. ITS REALLY UNFAIR

Das Spiel ist an sich gut, aber die DBD Entwickler halten es nicht für nötig, camper zu bannen. Dadurch campt fast jeder und das Spiel ist ungenießbar. Deshalb bitte ich euch: kauft euch nicht dieses Spiel!!!!!!

Nun habe ich über 1000 Spielstunden und es gibt  keine Veränderung!

постоянно горит зад с этой игры (передаю привет всем санным кемперам), но, тем не менее, очень сильно затягивает: проверяет вас как на хорошую реакцию, так и на хорошее терпение. с друзьями играть вообще самое то — и весело, и бомбишься сразу вместе.

п.с. немного разочаровывает вклад разраборов насчёт различных багов и, опять же, всё тех же кемперов.  СДЕЛАЙТЕ УЖЕ ХОТЬ ЧТО-НИБУДЬ.

В данной игре собрались самые мерзкие люди со всей планеты, чтобы плеваться в друг-друга желчью и обзывать однотипными словами. Здесь вас научат играть так, как хотят оппоненты. Убили всех - туннелер, кемпер, слагер и блять миллион других тупорылых терминов, которые придумали ноющие, пропитанные радиоактивными отходами, вроде бы, люди. Не убил никого или последний чел сбежал в люк - бэйби киллер, нуб, мать сдохла и т.д. Не советую игру для людей, которые легко заводятся или играют на результат. В этой игре приятно убивать сурвов, которые приседают и щелкают фонариком, а после смерти пишут гневный комментарий в ваш профиль. Играйте как хотите и не обращайте внимания на чат.

SABO JAKE

[h1]Плюсы[/h1]

[b]Динамика[/b]
[code]Именно в Dead by daylight игрок может прочувствовать то, что называется "Душа ушла в пятки" именно благодаря динамике в этой игре. Когда атмосфера гнятет, а маньяк буквально за спиной, ничего другого не остается, как убегать и пытаться выжить![/code]

[b]Графика[/b]
[code]Сама графика в игре выглядит красиво, а в целом цветовая гамма и создает ту атмосферу, которая и погружает игрока в события, происходящие на экране.[/code]

[b]Звук[/b]
[code]Так как на звуке построен почти весь геймплей, ибо нельзя услышать приближение маньяка, выключив звук, что неминуемо приведет к проигрышу - звук является одной из основных составляющих.[/code]


[h1]Минусы[/h1]

[b]Оптимизация[/b]
[code]Сам FPS в игре проседает, настройки выставленные на максимум будут грузить систему, что определенно съест оперативную память. Так же нельзя не сказать про ужасный лаунчер запуска, который требует на некоторых ОС дополнительных действий игрока, только чтобы [b]запустить[/b] эту игру.[/code]

4k+ hrs and still addicted...
Годно

[b]Here are the facts:[/b]
I bought this game when it was in Beta, closed Beta. I offered my friends keys, I played and it was pretty fun. I got the Deluxe edition because I really wanted to support them. I played the game for a couple of months and had to put it down to get a new computer. Cut forward a year or so later and I've gotten back into the game. Since Beta these are the issues that I am reporting and also talking about, which also happen to be the reason I don't think the devs deserve any more money:

[b]Let's talk about surviving-[/b]

[b]Pallet's are broken[/b] 
for all of the small sheds, if you look on my profile you can see video evidence of it. I had someone confirm with a screenshot in the official bug report thread that the problem is real and they've experienced it as well. The pallet's being broken also didn't used to be an issue in Beta.

[b]Survivors are no longer allowed to camp[/b] 
as there are crows that spawn above the survivor which is both good and bad. It's a good idea that was executed poorly. Not only do the crows spawn above you because you're camping but they also spawn if you're waiting for a camping hunter to go away. Why is this bad and why is this good? It's good for the hunter, it's bad because the crows stay there for 30 seconds-60 seconds straight, and if it's camping hunter you won't get far without being spotted. The crows are also unnecessary in my opinion as in Beta they didn't have them and it made the game more challenging because it forced the hunter to be active. If they didn't add the crows it wouldn't of been the end of the world as no progress would be made by either party until the survivor did something which means the survivor would be stuck for as long as they camped for. Even now I can still "camp" by alternating between walls every 10-15 seconds so the crows aren't really that effective obviously.

[b]Survivors are no longer allowed to loop window jumps ,[/b]
which was obnoxious to say the least. However I don't think it was a necessary addition because if someone were to do that in beta you just moved on to the other survivors. If there were no other survivors you'd be there with that one survivor until they messed up or got away which... if you don't pay attention to your surroundings, is what happens anyways. Most survivors didn't window loop for longer than maybe a minute until getting caught or moving on but I do understand the "moral" obligation to implement something that stopped the abuse of a feature.

[b]Hunters have an additional perk[/b] 
now to where their speed changes up to 15% during a chase which of course makes it even harder for the survivors to escape.

[b]Let's talk about the hunters-[/b]
(I'm talking about bare bones here, no extra perks or anything)

[b]The Wraith[/b] 
was added sometime in the Beta period. With his ability to turn invisible and have no heartbeat in this state. This killer is actually a great addition to Dead by Daylight and follows closely with the world and gameplay style of the game itself. The Wraith has to ring his bell to uncloak which is a great balancing technique so that players have a chance to get away and it's not an instant kill for the wraith.

[b]The Nurse[/b] 
is also a pretty unique and very well balanced killer. She can be a little OP with certain perks and an attentive player using her and her blink ability but it's not an instant kill with The Nurse either. Every time she blinks she either has to hit someone or suffer the 1-2 second stagger effect which forces her to look down and gives the survivor a chance to run away.

[b]The Trapper[/b] isn't a very fast killer and he doesn't do a lot of damage without his traps. But his traps are really important to his gameplay and doesn't always guarantee an instant pickup as the players have an opportunity to struggle and get away which can prove to be challenging without perks or good teamwork, but the killer is still very balanced as survivors (if paying attention) can easily spot The Trapper's traps most of the time.

[b]The Shade[/b] 
alright... so now that we've reviewed three of the most unique killers in the game and their bare bone gameplay style... let's talk about The Shade. 
With the addition of this killer any survivor in his line of sight is highlighted effectively making juking and quick hiding almost impossible. 
He starts off with an ability that practically allows him not to have a terror radius and he still does standard damage. 
But the player is allowed to choose when they level up their "Evil Within" rendering the "bu-that's-only-in-tier-one" argument invalid but also meaning they can keep their terror radius practically non-existent.
With an attentive and skilled killer that just means moving a bit slower than The Trapper (except not because of the chase tier speeds which are made easier by the highlighted survivors and he can highlight more than one as well), doing the same amount of damage, but without the ability to set traps.
Onto The Shade's next level tier... he's able to do everything in the above mentioned, but just a bit faster at the cost of just a slightly bigger terror radius, his terror radius isn't even normal at this point which gives him an advantage over The Trapper because not only does he have the chase tier speed perk (5% faster 10%, 15%) but he now is able to lunge a bit faster and move at a normal speed and has a reduced terror radius. 

His next tier is insane, first off he now FINALLY has a NORMAL terror radius which still gives him an advantage because it's exactly like playing The Trapper but you now have a lunge ability and increased movement speed/vaulting speed which makes it... once again.. almost impossible to escape him (Again keep in mind this is WITHOUT perks. Literally just standard abilities and normal survivors).
There also is no warning when he see's you or you're being followed as long as he stays far enough away, The Shade is difficult to play with in almost any tier because of these reasons.

[b]Adding perks[/b] 
just adds insult to injury with The Shade. Making him quieter, faster, able to instakill prey, and all around more effective and precise than any other killer who has a visual or audio penalty for missing their skill or attack, or just for using the skill in the first place (The Wraith's bell)

Now the argument can be made that "you can just equip perks noob" but that's entirely the opposite point I'm making here. I'm saying the base gameplay isn't balanced. Perks shouldn't be used to balance a game they should be used to enhance gameplay or experience. Not make it "fair".

[b]Now let's talk about a core element/mechanic that's really really basic and shows that they don't have a fundamental understanding of what they're doing or how it functions and had to struggle for a year to figure out how to do whilst charging their supporters for DLC and the core game itself, while not labeling it as a Beta game any longer-[/b]

[b]Ranks.[/b] 
They. Can't. Even. Save. Ranks.

[b]There is no penalty[/b] 
for camping hunters.


I still enjoy the game, it's fun to play with friends. But I don't think the Dev's deserve any more money, especially when they've released a bunch of DLC and the game isn't even complete and still has basic mechanic bugs they need to work out.

정말 좋은게임

农场主和偷电贼的斗智斗勇，玩人类或者屠夫有着完全不同的游戏体验，刚开始玩的时候可能会感觉很难玩，但入门之后还是很有意思的。这游戏的bug相信老玩家们都有所感慨，虽然现在我只玩了53个小时，地地道道的萌新，但我见过人类出生在高墙上、板子翻下来自己会卡在板子上动不了。。而且44个小时的时候不知道是因为结束杀鸡后没等同步完就退了steam还是游戏自己的问题，被清档了，所有人物都变成了一级。。。已经向黎明杀机官方发了电子邮件，目前在等待处理。处理结果会再发评测，总之我感觉杀鸡是个很有意思的，很新颖的游戏，就是希望官方可以对拔线这个行为做出更加合理的优化来提高玩家们的游戏体验，感谢所有看完这篇评论的人。

The worst community outside of a moba. Pay to Win Killers. Netcode from 1990. BC. Did I mention a toxic community? SurviveWithFriends breaks the balance of the game because it's balanced towards playing with randoms, but playing with randoms is about as much fun as punching yourself in the genitals. Matchmaking that is non existent, matching killers who are just starting with 1 perk against a team of 4 survivors with a collective 1200 hours between them. And I say this as one of the survivors, that's not fair. Also I'm not sure if there is somebody distributing a software lag switch or instructions on how to throttle internet, but it is INSANE the number of people I have played against who have a green ping which means under 100ms in the lobby, but then begin to teleport around the map. And no they aren't playing the Nurse. And I like this game, I do. I played it for 244 hours. But holy crap the frustrations at some point overrun the positives. Same reason I don't play PUBG.

This game has made me feel so many kinds of anger, sadness, defeat, and joy that I can't fault it any one way that trumps how much I enjoy it. I keep coming back, despite the jank and constant resurgence of old problems. There is something addictive to it, both casually and competitively. I'd be wrong to give it a bad review, because above all the complaints, I play the hell out of this title.

Игру убили в край. Своими апдейтами они внесли дисбаланс между выжившими и маньяком, в пользу второго. Постоянно попадаются кемперы или игроки которые портят игру, но разрабы закрывают на это глаза. С каждым апдейтом играть за выжевшего становится все менее интереснее.
